From the brand

Modern Solar Spotlights

Solar Lights for Pathway

Solar Spotlights for Pool

Solar Landscape Light for yard

Longer Runtime Solar Outdoor Lights: With advanced monocrystalline silicon solar panels, our solar spotlights outdoor can reach a conversion rate of 21.5%, which is charged for 6-8 hours under the same light intensity, our solar landscape spotlights can convert sunlight into more electricity compared with others. So these solar lights outdoor can stay on for more than 12 hours at night without getting dark.
2 Adjustable Brightness Modes: Our outdoor solar spotlights can be adjusted 2 brightness to suit different scenes. Low Light Mode(12hrs) is suitable for garden, patio or yard. High Light Mode(6hrs) is for walkway, driveway or porch. And these solar lights outdoor can automatically switch by detecting the brightness of the surroundings. Light off at dawn, charge in direct sunlight. Light up at dusk, automatically enter working mode.
IP68 Waterproof Rating Solar Garden Lights: With durable high-impact ABS plastic, our solar landscape spotlights can not only reach IP68 waterproof rating, heat resistant, frost resistant, withstand all kinds of bad weather, but also have a longer service life, reaching 40000+ hours. They are much more durable than other less waterproof grade lights.
2 Installation Options & Quality Assurance: Our solar spotlights outdoor can stick into the ground with stakes, or mount on the wall with the screws included. There are 2 installation methods for you to choose.
